member.name: T:SimpleDataApp.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SimpleDataApp.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SimpleDataApp.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.FillOrCancel.btnFindByOrderID_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Executes a t-SQL SELECT query on the database to obtain order data for a specified order ID.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.FillOrCancel.btnFillOrder_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Fills an order by running the Sales.uspFillOrder stored procedure on the database.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.FillOrCancel.btnCancelOrder_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Cancels an order by running the Sales.uspCancelOrder stored procedure on the database.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.FillOrCancel.btnFinishUpdates_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes the form and returns focus to the Navigation form.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.Navigation.btnGoToAdd_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Opens the NewCustomer form as a dialog box, which returns focus to the calling form when it closes.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.Navigation.btnGoToFillOrCancel_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Opens the FillOrCancel form as a dialog box.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.Navigation.btnExit_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes the application (not just the navigation form).

member.name: P:SimpleDataApp.NewCustomer.IsCustomerNameValid
member.summary: Verifies that the customer name text box is not empty.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.NewCustomer.IsOrderDataValid
member.summary: Verifies the order data is valid.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.NewCustomer.btnCreateAccount_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Creates a new account by executing the Sales.uspNewCustomer stored procedure on the database.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.NewCustomer.btnPlaceOrder_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Places the order by executing the Sales.uspPlaceNewOrder stored procedure on the database.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.NewCustomer.btnAddAnotherAccount_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Resets the form for another new account.

member.name: M:SimpleDataApp.NewCustomer.btnAddFinish_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes the NewCustomer form and returns focus to the Navigation form.
